snippet: Egyptian officials have postponed a trip to Rome to discuss the investigation into the killing of Giulio Regeni whose body was found on the outskirts of Cairo in February.
abstract: Egyptian officials postpone trip to Rome to discuss investigation into death of Italian student Giulio Regeni, who human rights groups believe was tortured and killed by Egyptian security forces.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian officials have postponed a trip to Rome to discuss the investigation into the killing of Giulio Regeni whose body was found on the outskirts of Cairo in February.

headline.main: Egypt: Meeting in Rome on Killing of Italian Student is Postponed
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Meeting in Rome on Killing of Italian Student Is Postponed
